## Bio

I am a research assistant in the biostatistics team of the Bordeaux Population Health Center. I take part in the development of new statistical methods for analyzing longitudinal data. 

## Education

**2010 - 2012 : Master's degree in statistics**, Strasbourg University, France

**2007 - 2010 : Bachelor's degree in mathematics**, Strasbourg University, France

## Experiences

**Since 2017 : Statistician**, Permanent position (ingénieure d'étude contractuelle en CDI), Bordeaux Population Health center

**2012 - 2017 : Statistician**, Non-permanent position (ingénieure d'étude contractuelle en CDD), Bordeaux Population Health center

**2012 : 5 months internship in biostatistics**, Bordeaux Population Health center

**2011 : 2 months internship in biostatistics**, IGBMC, Illkirch-Graffenstaden
